name: Planet of Big Insects
description:
Modifications:

1- Don't Destroy Music Script, the purpose of this script is to keep music playing between levels.

2- Options Menu. From this you can control the graphics, resolution, Fullscreen, music and sound effects volumes.

3- Changed Music of the game. Credit: Eminem ft. Dido - Stan Intro

4- Added 2 audio mixers one for controlling the music volume and the other for the effects volume.

5- Added 3 unique levels.

6- Changed some elements of the UI.

Created By: xDFzFTW

With Assets from MSU

Try to survive till the end!

Killing monsters drops pickups, and these are ammo and health, and somtimes keys!

Instructions:

Try not to get hit from enemies and you're good to go!

In some levels, you have to take multiple keys to multiple doors in order to proceed.

You can change the volume of the music and sound effects from the options menu.
